channel.title: fe on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in fe on funPlantGenes

item.title: AhFRDL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AhFRDL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhFRDL1-mediated citrate secretion contributes to adaptation to iron deficiency and aluminum stress in peanuts.

item.title: CsMTP7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMTP7 Gene Name: metal tolerance protein 7 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber metal tolerance protein 7 (CsMTP7) is involved in the accumulation of Fe in mitochondria under Fe excess.

item.title: GhACT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A05G040150 Gene Symbol: GhACT1 Gene Name: Genome: HAU-AD1_genome_v1.

item.title: GhGASL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D04G017310 Gene Symbol: GhGASL3 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 genome (HAU-AD1_genome_v1.

item.title: GLB1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g41970 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0499100 Gene Symbol: GLB1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GmbHLH300
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.03G130600 Gene Symbol: GmbHLH300 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYSL7 knockout increases the expression of GmbHLH300, a transcription factor required for Fe response of nodules.

item.title: GmbHLH57
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G178500 Gene Symbol: GmbHLH57 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The expression of GmbHLH57 and GmbHLH300, two Fe-related genes expressed in nodules of Gmysl7 mutants.

item.title: GmVTL1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G076300 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1b Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a and GmVTL1b are specifically expressed in the fixation zone of soybean nodules.

item.title: GmYSL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G203400 Gene Symbol: GmYSL7 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYSL7 controls iron uptake, allocation, and cellular response of nodules in soybean.

item.title: HvYS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvYS1 Gene Name: iron–phytosiderophore transporter Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: We identified a gene specifically encoding an iron–phytosiderophore transporter (HvYS1) in barley, which is the most tolerant species to iron deficiency among graminaceous plants.

item.title: IbVP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbVP1 Gene Name: H+-pyrophosphatase 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: H+-pyrophosphatase IbVP1 promotes efficient iron use in sweet potato.

item.title: LeFRO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFRO1 Gene Name: ferric-chelate reductase1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRO1 encoding an Fe(III)-chelate reductase protein was isolated from the tomato genome.

item.title: LeIRT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeIRT1 Gene Name: iron-regulated transporter 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRO1 encoding an Fe(III)-chelate reductase protein was isolated from the tomato genome.

item.title: LeIRT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeIRT2 Gene Name: iron-regulated transporter 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: To extend our molecular knowledge of Fe transport in crop plants, we have isolated two cDNAs (LeIRT1 and LeIRT2) from a library constructed from roots of iron-deficient tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) plants, using the Arabidopsis iron transporter cDNA, IRT1, as a probe.

item.title: LjMATE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMATE1 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion (MATE) protein1 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjMATE1: A Citrate Transporter Responsible for Iron Supply to the Nodule Infection Zone of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MdAHA8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000181085 Gene Symbol: MdAHA8 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdbHLH104
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000825749 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH104 Gene Name: basic helix-loop-helix transcription factor 104 Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdBT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1161300 Gene Symbol: MdBT2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MsLEA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsLEA1 Gene Name: Late embryogenesis-abundant (LEA) 1 Genome: alfalfa genome(https://sciencedirect.

item.title: MsLEA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MS.gene058705 Gene Symbol: MsLEA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsLEA1 recruits and protects its target proteins (SOD and Ms1770) and increases alfalfa tolerance against drought and Al stresses.

item.title: MtCIPK12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g086380 Gene Symbol: MtCIPK12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Protein kinase MtCIPK12 modulates iron reduction in Medicago truncatula by regulating riboflavin biosynthesis.

item.title: MusaDMR6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma04_p20880.1 Gene Symbol: MusaDMR6 Gene Name: downy mildew resistance 6 Genome: Species: Musa balbisiana Functional Descriptions: The downy mildew resistance 6 (DMR6) is a susceptibility gene encoding 2-oxoglutarate Fe(II)-dependent oxygenase (2OGO), which is up-regulated during pathogen infection.

item.title: MxHA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1130200 Gene Symbol: MxHA2 Gene Name: plasma membrane (PM) H+-ATPase Genome: Species: Malus xiaojinensis Functional Descriptions: MxMPK6-2-mediated phosphorylation enhances the response of apple rootstocks to Fe deficiency by activating PM H+-ATPase MxHA2.

item.title: MxMPK4-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1069100 Gene Symbol: MxMPK4-1 Gene Name: Malus xiaojinensis Mitogen-activated protein kinase 4-1 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MxMPK6-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MxMPK6-2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus xiaojinensis Functional Descriptions: MxMPK6-2-bHLH104 interaction is involved in reactive oxygen species signaling in response to iron deficiency in apple rootstock.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1128500 Gene Symbol: MxRBOHD2 Gene Name: Malus xiaojinensis Mitogen-activated protein kinase 4-1 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.
